description: This CSS file contains styles and variables for managing themes (light and dark) in a frontend application, specifically for the App component of an expense tracker.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application component styles, including background color, text color, and layout settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles specific to the header of the application, controlling the layout and appearance.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animation effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including the button's visual presentation and hover effects.
